name: PROUNION a.s.
membership:
Únia klastrov Slovenska, www.uksk.sk (National level)
Bioeconomy Cluster, www.bioeconomy.sk (National level)
goal: To increase quality of life of rural stakeholders mainly in Slovakia through providing consulting services including transfer of knowledge from EU policies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Rural Development Policy and Common Agricultural Policy, European Innovation Partnership for Agricultural Productivity and Sustainability
